name: Catholic Charities of Arkansas
address: 2500 N Tyler St, Little Rock, AR 72207
description: Provides a wide range of services including addiction services, adoption services, basic needs, case management, counseling, disaster response, housing services, and migrant services. They are committed to serving those who are poor or marginalized
services: Catholic-owned On-site management in Arkansas consultation

name: Christopher Homes of Arkansas, Inc.
address: Multiple complexes across Arkansas; administrative office at 2500 N. Tyler St., Little Rock, AR 72207 (associated with the Diocese of Little Rock)
description: A housing ministry of the Diocese of Little Rock that provides safe, attractive, and affordable housing for low-income individuals aged 62 and older, or those with mobility impairments. They manage 24 complexes across Arkansas
services: Catholic-owned On-site management in Arkansas consultation
